item.title: Happy B-Day!
item.description: Hey! I love you dude! I hope you have an awesome day!

item.title: Right to Roam
item.description: The freedom to roam, or “everyman’s right”, is the general public’s right to access certain public or privately owned land, lakes, and rivers for recreation and exercise. The right is sometimes called the right of public access to the wilderness or the “right to roam”. In Scotland In Scotland the Land Reform (Scotland) Act 2003 comprehensively codified into Scots law the ancient tradition of the right to universal access to the land in Scotland.

item.title: The Lazy Duck Cabin
item.description: A nice cozy cabin in the Cairngorms National Park. To some degree, you take care of your own food! Herbs, eggs, fish… It can be an escape from stressful times and a way to get used to homesteading ♥

title: “Kibble Palace” date: 2020-12-22T19:16:11+01:00 draft: false Not far from you there is a delicate glass dome that covers another world in moist air and soft sunshine—The Kibble Palace. ![](/Users/diogo/Documents/repositories/scotland/content/img/Screen Shot 2020-12-22 at 7.06.31 PM.png) Inside you can find plant from all over the world, outside, Botanical Gardens and River Kelvin. Maybe Charon will be nearby and let you cross :)
